Header.carpetCleaningDesc: Professional deep cleaning service for all types of carpets and rugs.
Header.windowCleaningDesc: Spotless window cleaning for residential and commercial properties, leaving your windows sparkling.

Hero.title: Premium Carpet & Window Cleaning You Can Trust
Hero.subtitle: Refresh your home with expert cleaning that enhances both comfort and clarity

Services.scheduleToday: Schedule your service today and discover the CleanPro difference. We guarantee your satisfaction.
Services.title: Our Specialized Services
Services.carpetCleaningDesc: Revitalize your home with our deep carpet cleaning technology that removes dirt, stains, allergens, and odors.
Services.windowCleaningDesc: Transform your space with crystal-clear windows that enhance natural light and improve your property's appearance.

basic.title: Basic Cleaning
basic.description: Quick and efficient cleaning for regular maintenance of carpets and windows.

residential.title: Residential Cleaning
residential.description: Comprehensive solutions for all carpets, rugs, and windows in your home.

commercial.title: Commercial Cleaning
commercial.description: Professional service for businesses needing pristine carpets and crystal-clear windows.

recurring.title: Recurring Plans
recurring.description: Scheduled cleanings to maintain impeccable carpets and spotless windows year-round.

deepCleaning.title: Deep Cleaning Technology
deepCleaning.description: Advanced extraction methods that remove deeply embedded dirt and allergens

stainRemoval.title: Stain Removal
stainRemoval.description: Specialized treatments for tough stains and high-traffic areas

fastDrying.title: Fast Drying
fastDrying.description: Powerful equipment that leaves your carpets dry in just a few hours

inspection.title: Inspection
inspection.description: We thoroughly assess your carpets to identify stains and high-traffic areas

pretreatment.title: Pre-treatment
pretreatment.description: Application of specialized cleaning agents to break down soils and stains

extraction.title: Deep Extraction
extraction.description: Hot water extraction to remove dirt, allergens, and cleaning solutions

finishing.title: Final Touches
finishing.description: Grooming and spot treatments to ensure a perfectly clean finish

health.title: Healthier Indoor Environment
health.description: Removal of allergens, dust mites, and bacteria for improved air quality

lifespan.title: Extended Carpet Life
lifespan.description: Regular professional cleaning helps preserve carpet fibers and appearance

appearance.title: Enhanced Appearance
appearance.description: Restoration of color and texture for a more inviting living space

testimonials.quote1: The carpet cleaning service exceeded my expectations. Our carpets look brand new again, and the technicians were professional and efficient.
testimonials.quote2: I was amazed at how they removed stains I thought were permanent. My carpet hasn't looked this good since it was installed!
testimonials.quote3: Highly recommend their carpet cleaning service. The team was punctual, thorough, and the results speak for themselves.

streakFree.title: Streak-Free Results
streakFree.description: Professional cleaning techniques that leave your windows crystal clear

complete.title: Interior & Exterior
complete.description: Complete cleaning of all window surfaces, frames, and tracks

hardWater.title: Hard Water Treatment
hardWater.description: Specialized solutions for mineral deposits and hard water stains

assessment.title: Assessment
assessment.description: We evaluate all window surfaces to determine the best cleaning approach

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.description: Careful removal of debris from frames and tracks before cleaning

cleaning.title: Cleaning
cleaning.description: Professional-grade solutions applied and removed with specialized tools

polishing.title: Polishing
polishing.description: Final detailing to ensure a streak-free, crystal-clear finish

light.title: Increased Natural Light
light.description: Clean windows allow up to 40% more natural light into your space

preservation.title: Window Preservation
preservation.description: Removal of damaging contaminants that can deteriorate frames and glass

appearance.title: Improved Home Appearance
appearance.description: Sparkling windows dramatically enhance your property's curb appeal

testimonials.quote1: I'm amazed at how clean my windows are now. The team was thorough and detailed, and the results are truly outstanding.
testimonials.quote2: They cleaned windows I couldn't even reach and removed years of hard water stains. My home feels so much brighter now!
testimonials.quote3: Professional, efficient, and the cleanest windows I've ever had. Will definitely use their services again.

WhatWeDo.title: What We Do
WhatWeDo.description: At CleanPro Montreal, we redefine cleaning excellence. Our expert team combines advanced techniques with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring your carpets and windows are not only clean but restored to their original beauty, enhancing your entire space.

list.precision: Specialized cleaning adapted to each surface and material
list.expertise: Expert stain treatment and streak-free window finishes
list.customization: Customized cleaning solutions based on your specific needs

LuxuryShowcase.title: Experience Excellence
LuxuryShowcase.image1Description: Discover our premium cleaning service that brings your precious residential carpets back to life, removing deep-seated dirt and allergens.
LuxuryShowcase.image2Description: Our streak-free window cleaning transforms your view, maximizing natural light and enhancing your home's appearance inside and out.
LuxuryShowcase.image3Description: Delicate treatment for your most precious rugs, preserving their original colors and texture without harsh chemicals.
LuxuryShowcase.image4Description: Complete cleaning solutions for professional spaces, ensuring both carpets and windows project the perfect image for your business.

Pricing.title: Our Rates
Pricing.description: We offer flexible and affordable rates for all your cleaning needs, from carpets to windows and more.
Pricing.customQuoteDescription: Contact us for a personalized quote tailored to your specific needs and budget.

About.title: About Our Company
About.subtitle: Cleaning Excellence Redefined
About.description: CleanPro Montreal offers unparalleled cleaning services, transforming your carpets and windows into immaculate features that enhance your entire space. With meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to excellence, we create environments that breathe cleanliness, comfort, and clarity.
About.image1Description: Transform your carpets with our professional deep-cleaning techniques that remove allergens and revitalize fibers.
About.image2Description: Experience streak-free window cleaning that maximizes natural light and enhances views.
About.image3Description: Protect your carpets against future stains and your windows against hard water spots.
About.image4Description: Keep your professional spaces immaculate with comprehensive cleaning services.

WhyChooseUs.title: WHY CHOOSE US
WhyChooseUs.subtitle: CleanPro serves Montreal with a passion for perfection. Choose us for our expertise in both carpet and window cleaning.

sparklingClean.title: EXCEPTIONAL RESULTS
sparklingClean.description: We guarantee that your carpets will regain their original luster and your windows will achieve perfect clarity, with thorough cleaning that addresses even the most challenging problems.

leadingTech.title: ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY
leadingTech.description: Our cutting-edge equipment and eco-friendly products ensure exceptional results while protecting your surfaces, your family, and the environment.

insured.title: FULLY INSURED
insured.description: With comprehensive insurance coverage, we protect your property during every service, providing peace of mind along with cleanliness.

reliableCrew.title: CERTIFIED EXPERTS
reliableCrew.description: Our cleaning specialists are trained in the latest techniques and certified to treat all types of carpets and window surfaces.

content.customers: We treat each home and business with the utmost care, using methods adapted to your specific surfaces and needs.
content.environment: Our cleaning products are eco-friendly and safe for your family, pets, and the planet.
content.communication: Your satisfaction is guaranteed. If you're not completely satisfied with our work, we'll return at no additional charge.

LuxuryAppeal.title: The appeal of immaculate spaces
LuxuryAppeal.subtitle: Discover how perfectly maintained carpets and windows transform your environment

benefits.visualAppealDesc: Clean carpets and sparkling windows instantly elevate your interior's appearance
benefits.perceptionDesc: Professional cleaning removes allergens and pollutants for a healthier, more prestigious space
benefits.businessGrowthDesc: Regular maintenance extends the life of your carpets and prevents window deterioration

LuxuryAppeal.statisticDesc: in indoor air quality and natural light with regular professional cleaning
